thread.title: Dog poo-powered street lamp gets tails wagging

title: Dog poo-powered street lamp gets tails wagging
text:
Dog poo-powered street lamp gets tails wagging Friday, February 16, 2018 - 02:14 
An inventor in Worcestershire's Malvern Hills creates a street lamp powered by bio-gas from dog poo, giving ramblers the perfect place to dispose of their pets' deposits. Matthew Stock reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
An inventor in Worcestershire's Malvern Hills creates a street lamp powered by bio-gas from dog poo, giving ramblers the perfect place to dispose of their pets' deposits. Matthew Stock reports.
